sentences.en: And a roach spans a crevice in the floor.
sentences.cn: 一只蟑螂爬过了地板的裂缝.

sentences.en: And roach droppings , while almost invisible, can trigger serious respiratory problems.
sentences.cn: 肉眼难以看到的蟑螂屎还会引发严重的呼吸疾病.

sentences.en: European freshwater fish resembling the roach.
sentences.cn: 类似于斜齿鳊的欧洲淡水鱼.

sentences.en: He also creates a roach warren to field the new roach unit on the battlefield.
sentences.cn: 脊椎爬行者还建造蟑螂繁殖场,来把新增的蟑螂部队投入战场.

sentences.en: He bought some roach clips and hashish pipes at the head shop.
sentences.cn: 在麻药品店里他买了些蟑螂夹子和烟管.

sentences.en: He found his brother in a seedy, roach-infested apartment.
sentences.cn: 他发现自己的哥哥住在一套破旧肮脏、蟑螂肆虐的公寓里。

sentences.en: How many kids in this world get sprayed with roach poison?
sentences.cn: 这世上有多少孩子被这蟑螂毒药喷过?

sentences.en: I &; am quot; m impre ed by your a roach to busine.
sentences.cn: 你们经营业务的方法给我留下了很深的印象.

sentences.en: I found a roach in my meal, and it did a head!
sentences.cn: 我在饭里发现一只蟑螂, 而且是没头的!

sentences.en: Now I know where they got the idea for the Roach Motel.
sentences.cn: 现在我知道他们是从蟑螂旅馆得到的灵感.

sentences.en: Strong skills as being a team a roach.
sentences.cn: 有良好的团队合作精神.

sentences.en: The bug buffet continues with a cooked roach eating contest Oct . 13 — Friday , Oct . 13.
sentences.cn: 10月13日, 六旗游乐园还将举行一次吃熟蟑螂的比赛.

sentences.en: The lake was restocked with roach last year.
sentences.cn: 去年，这个湖里又放养了一些拟鲤。

sentences.en: Tom is never sick; he is as sound as a roach.
sentences.cn: 汤姆从不生病, 身体壮如牛.

sentences.en: Working out of Freddie Roach's Wild Card Boxing Club in Hollywood, Calif.
sentences.cn: 在加州好莱坞的野卡拳击馆,接受弗雷迪.罗奇的指导.

trans.tran_cn: 蟑螂，[鱼]斜齿鳊，<美俚>大麻烟卷的烟蒂，[航]横帆下缘的弧形切口
